name: DealerUplink
overview:
Dealer Uplink

The Industry leader in providing QR Barcodes for Auto Dealers. Their technology connects the next generation of auto buyers with forward thinking automotive dealers by utilizing the Quick Display Network making their program 90% faster than all other technology.

  • QR Barcodes -

The Automotive Industry has been slow to implement QR Barcodes because of the lack of complete Inventory Solutions in the market. Dealer Uplink developed the first QR Barcode Inventory Solution for Auto Dealers whereby they eliminate manual input of each QR Barcode functionality.

  • The Vision -

QUOTE: Its not too often when a simple idea could change an industry. The simple fact is that there is limited time for auto dealers to shift their focus to capturing the next generation of auto buyers. They must start leading the way with technology and not waiting for the customer to push the demand. Dealer Uplink was born from this simple, yet powerful concept; said Jay Martinez, CEO

  • Quick Display Network -

Dealer Uplink has exclusive rights in Northern US to utilize the Quick Display Network (QDN) which provides customers over 20+ ways to stay connected to the dealership from one scan which trumps the technology of one-to-one links currently used in QR Barcode technology. Furthermore, their tracking capabilities ensure the dealerships they are seeing results, traffic and ultimately more leads.

  • Staples, INC. -

Dealer Uplink and Staples, Inc. have strategically partnered which each other which guarantees their clients quick setup, maintenance and warranty on their programs.

  • Contact Information -

Corporate Offices corp@dealeruplink.com 855-4-UPLINK

Twitter: @dealeruplink LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/company/2196702 Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Dealer-Uplink/203176269700640

For a live demo, contact sales@dealeruplink.com or visit http://dealeruplink.com
